Welcome

Livingstonia Safaris

We emphasize quality guided Uganda  Safaris. Customized eastern gorilla trekking adventures and nature tours that are well organized, affordable and educative for avid and novice bird watching travelers. Run after wildlife with our patient, experienced and local award-winning guides

Lets

Dare To Explore

See the most productive bird areas in the East African region. The western part of the country has a vast range of bird species a serious birder would consider while planning one Uganda bird watching safari.  The tour will cover a multitude of habitats from lush rain-forest, wild Savannah, to wetlands and swamps. The scenery is varied and arguably some of the finest in Africa, and the mammal experience will be great

Book Now
Places to go

Perfect Destinations

Most people come to Uganda for gorilla trekking and chimpanzee trekking safaris but leave with memories of the people and the beautiful landscape. 

Locations

Scheduled or Customised
Adventure!

Livingstonia Safaris experiences require cautious technical and logistical preparations; therefore while designing Itineraries, we focus on individual or group preferences. Our personable and knowledgeable guides, skillfully emphasise quality tours in the field.

Discover Uganda

Semuliki National Park

It lies along the Uganda-Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) border within the western arm of the Rift valley. The park covers the eastern extension of the vast Ituri Forest.

Uganda Safaris

Queen Elizabeth National Park

Queen Elizabeth National Park is Uganda’s most popular game reserve and certainly one of the most scenic.

Uganda Safaris

Rwanda Discovery Safari

Experience all highlights in just one trip! Travel from the capital city of Kigali to the wilderness in Akagera.

Rwanda Safaris

Kibale Forest National Park

Kibale Forest National Park is a national park in South-western Uganda protecting moist evergreen rain forest and other numerous primate species

Uganda Safaris
